title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 163.7 - Additional charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 163.7 - Additional charges

State Regulations

The department shall assess additional charges to program
paticipants for extraordinary inspection costs as follows: (a) actual inspection related travel expenses
in those cases where the point of inspection is in excess of 300 miles one way
from the inspector's official station; (b) actual costs of reinspection where the
original inspection of a trademark product failed to meet the required quality
standards; and
(c) actual costs of
providing additional on-site supervisory services to participants as deemed
necessary by the department to ensure adherence to the trademark product
quality standards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
163.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
